description: This file defines a utility class 'Env' for managing environment variables and backend URL configuration in a Flutter app. It provides methods to load environment variables asynchronously, safely access variables, and determine the appropriate backend base URL depending on whether the app is running on web or mobile.

classes.name: Env
classes.description: A static utility class for environment variable management and backend URL calculation, designed for use across the Flutter application.

methods.name: ensureLoaded
methods.description: Loads the '.env' file once, with error handling; safe to call multiple times.

methods.name: getVar
methods.description: Retrieves a variable from the environment asynchronously, returning null if not present.

methods.name: backendBaseUrl
methods.description: Determines the backend base URL based on environment variables or defaults suitable for web and mobile platforms.
